author: mseidel42
body:
Update to Pythia 8.313, contains
* Updated [Hadronization Variations](https://pythia.org/latest-manual/HadronizationVariations.html)
* Fixed bugs in Vincia merging, recoilStrategyRF, and QCD Colour-Reconnection model 

Full changelog here: https://pythia.org/latest-manual/UpdateHistory.html#section0

Needs https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47092
title: Pythia 8.313
